title: Effect of govt sp decrease and money supply incr

content.question: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, which of the following will most likely happen if a countryâ€™s government decreases its spending and the central bank increases the money supply?

choices.label: An increase in unemployment and an appreciation of the currency
An increase in interest rates and a decrease in aggregate supply
A decrease in interest rates and an increase in investment spending
A depreciation of the currency and an increase in imports
An increase in aggregate demand and unemployment

content.answer: A decrease in interest rates and an increase in investment spending

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
